website_summaries.verdict: This dent repair kit has all the essentials and more at a decent price.
pros: Has a variety of shapes and sizes of tabs
Environmentally friendly, with no chemicals involved

customer_reviews.title: Finally got one that worked
customer_reviews.text: This is the third set of PDR tools that I ordered from Amazon. First set had a defective slide hammer. The second set was a total joke, it was a set that someone had abused and returned with missing parts, dirty and with glue remnants on the pullers. The glue gun was missing as well. The only thing I was annoyed about with this last set is that the glue sticks that came in the set were very short, not as shown in the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: linkster39

customer_reviews.title: Saved me over $200 so far...
customer_reviews.text: I’m extremely particular about my Mustang GT and very few things bother me more than thinking about a ding on my car that’s going to haunt me every time I look at it. So far, I’ve pulled 4 dings out with this tool that would have cost me $50 each at a PDR shop. I can’t speak for anything yet that’s bigger than 1 inch in diamerter, but for the smaller “garage” door dings, this is a must.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph B.

customer_reviews.title: Gets most door dings and small dents out. With ...
customer_reviews.text: Gets most door dings and small dents out. With regards to the ones it doesn't, it does get them to be unnoticeable for the most part.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cissell

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This really worked. I watched the video and followed what it showed me to do. I had to use the yellow glue gun sticks it came with even though it recommenced White for my car. So the only thing confusing was the instructions in the box showed a more extensive kit so it may be confusing to some. Plus it came with a scraper that was difficult to use. The glue sticks to my car but I used mineral oil to work it off.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! It fix my car dent in less the a hr. It comes with couple of deferent types of dent repair tool, so if one does not work you have another one you can try.Truly recommend this product it will save a lot money.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: glue sticks to car, not to attachment
customer_reviews.text: Sadly, after watching multiple youtube videos and following all instructions, glue adhered to the car, but whenever force was applied, the attachment would dislodge leaving the glue on the car and the dent firmly intact. I patiently tried again and again and spent a LOT of time scraping glue off the paint. Very discouraging.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality product
customer_reviews.text: Received the Super PDR, followed the instructions, and started to attempt to fix the dents on my car. Unfortunately, the top handle of the "GOLDEN DENT LIFTER" broke. I thought it was not assembled completely at the factory, so I attempted to screw the handle back. But, as you can see in the photos, the screw on the handle is extremely short, not enough to insert and secure it on back to the LIFTER. I had to use the broken LIFTER to fix the dents, but, it was just useless. Returned it for a refund. The product material seems pretty high, it appears to be a bad quality control at the factory. Avoid this product if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Soak the tabs for 3hrs in alcohol
customer_reviews.text: This product works. It real important to read the directions. You have to soak the plastic parts you stick on the body panels for 3 hrs. Real important, tried it without soaking and didn't work so good. I was able to pull a dent out of a motorcycle tank, right on the edge.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: May need additional glue depending on vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Good product and works as described yet advertising falls to tell you if you have an American or European car with thicker steel, you will need different glue that is not included.
customer_reviews.author: RRoyer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, affordable tool.
customer_reviews.text: This thing really works. I’ve used it on 3 door dings with success. I don’t know about a larger dent. I did have to pull the dent 3 or 4 times to get them out but so what? A little patience and that annoying door ding was gone X-3. Hint, works better when metal is warm on a sunny day.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Hodgkinson

customer_reviews.title: Gimmicky
customer_reviews.text: Just another Gimmick I don’t usually fall for gimmicks but this is one I fell for. I have a travel trailer with aluminum siding that had been caught in a hell storm and has small dents all over it. I bought this kit thinking I would take them out myself and all it ended up doing is leaving glue behind on the dents. I can’t imagine that this works on vehicles seeing most are thicker metal than aluminum siding 1 star dissatisfied for sure....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much for “Paintless”
customer_reviews.text: So much for “paintless dent repair” used it on my Ducati tank. It started pulling the dent until I heard a pop. And when I looked down it had ripped a piece of paint off... and this is a VERY well maintained paint job. I’ve waxed it and polished it every few months, store it in that garage out of the sunlight, everything you’re suppose to do... cannot express how upset this makes me...
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Pierce

customer_reviews.title: It really work.
customer_reviews.text: Never had any experience on dent repairs. Supper happy with results. Took me long time to figure out on all that tools, comes with many many accessories and even more. My suggestion check some videos online and do your research how to properly youse it. Super excised to do some more dent pulls. Just take more time on proper tools. Definitely recommend who ever like to work on cars!!!
customer_reviews.author: hua huang

customer_reviews.title: Did the job! Used on a SS refrigerator, ...
customer_reviews.text: Did the job! Used on a SS refrigerator, and worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Great tool
customer_reviews.text: I have never pulled dents from my car before. It actually works. Watched the videos and used copious amounts of glue and was able to remove many dents. Unfortunately if the dent is in one of the trim lines you will need to get access from behind the dent. Also you will need more alcohol for the spray bottle. Great tool.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pirozzi

customer_reviews.title: Not easy, but works exactly as described.
customer_reviews.text: I dented the tailgate on my truck. Dent is on the crease. I watched about 50 youtube videos and have been taking my time. The results are impressive, over half the dent is gone and improving. I've only spent an hour on it and estimate at least 2 more. Still worth it.
customer_reviews.author: AB Squared

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Came with all the parts shown in the picture. I used to fix a small dent on my BMW on front. Had to reattach and pull the dent a few times to get good results. All parts that came with it are good quality, including glue gun. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Maneja

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't pull small dents
customer_reviews.text: I read here online that it would pull small dents. The brochure, when you receive it says it does not pull small dents. Well.. I had 3 small dents I wanted to pull so this did nothing for me. The glue connection to the car snapped off before pulling any dents every time. I followed the directions and made several attempts.
customer_reviews.author: The Happy or Unhappy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Paintless Dent Repair
customer_reviews.text: Overall speaking is good, or the effect, repair time to have patience, DORA a few times, do not think of a few to fix, after repair glue with high concentration of alcohol removal effect will be better, not the pursuit of perfection or worth buying, you can spend less money, tool repair can also be kept for future use.
customer_reviews.author: fmlfml65

customer_reviews.title: Dent remover
customer_reviews.text: I guess it's true you get what you pay for. Item not easy to work with, glue doesn't hold most of the time. And when it does dent reappears just as soon as you release the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK Product
customer_reviews.text: It will do what you want to pull out dents, however, it is not that simple. Literally expect to have a high learning curve and even at that, it doesn't work as well as you would hope.
customer_reviews.author: CSSO

customer_reviews.title: Adjust your expectations
customer_reviews.text: Don't expect perfection. But if you have a dent in an older car that just doesn't justify the cost of a pro, this is a cheap fix. Adjust your expectations accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Vic Oeftering

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality
customer_reviews.text: This thing paid for itself the day I opened the box...Excellent for removal of small dents in motorcycle gas tanks........follow the included instructions and it'll work great!
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: Worth to buy for this price.
customer_reviews.text: I have a little dent on the top left side of my Toyota Sienna, it will cost few hundred dollars to get it fixed, so I want to give a try for this product. It’s fast delivery and everything wrap separate and professional. I tried right the way on my car, it’s pretty easy to use if you follow the instructions. The suction is strong enough to pull the dent out nicely. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa zhao

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, it actually works and Blazing fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the amount of money and theres a ton of different glue suction cups. Shipping was outrageous I ordered it at about 3 pm on Friday and got it Saturday afternoon. Would definitely recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ta diggins

customer_reviews.title: Best for smaller dents with no paint damage
customer_reviews.text: Best for smaller dents with no paint damage. It does work, be patient and don't expect perfection right away, it's a bit of an art.
customer_reviews.author: Justin W.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: works well on small dents about golf ball sized. But it doesn't damage the paint and its easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Bragg

customer_reviews.title: Used!
customer_reviews.text: This product showed up with most of the packaging compromised. It was obviously used. There was still a glue stick in the gun. Some of the pads had glue on them. The glue sticks are probably sub-standard. The glue did not hold strong enough to repair dents. The instructions were poorly written and cheaply produced. The website provided was not active. I gave this product 5 stars for sucking a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to remove a few small dings and that’s exactly what it did very happy
customer_reviews.author: Dan j.

customer_reviews.title: Great dent puller for the money
customer_reviews.text: Patience is the key to making it work properly and getting the best results
customer_reviews.author: charles bridges

customer_reviews.title: Go to a professional
customer_reviews.text: It didn't even pop out the dents in the car it actually caused more little dents
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used yet.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used yet. Very sorry. Doesn't make for an enlightening review. All came with order and looks very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: Dent and Ding puller
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed a bunch of videos and user sites before purchasing this. It worked like a camp and I was able to make a couple door dings on my S2000 disappear like they never happened. Take the time to watch some vids and go slow. Works just as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: sj@tpc

customer_reviews.title: Be careful
customer_reviews.text: Let me first say this you can definitely make your small problem a bigger one if you don’t have patience and the time set aside to fix what you need to. The reason I 3 starred is the fact I know for sure I got a used kit.
customer_reviews.author: Kiarra J.

customer_reviews.title: I couldn’t get it to work
customer_reviews.text: Tried using once and the results, didn’t fix dent at all
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Know what it can do before you buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it so the hail dent would disappear. But, it did not. It improved the the dent by 80% but, it is still there. I will have to take it to a professional. The quality of the tools is good!
customer_reviews.author: janetplanetz

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had much success yet...but it's no fault of the product...I just need more practice.
customer_reviews.author: ccalvo

customer_reviews.title: doesn't work to take small dents out
customer_reviews.text: it's cool looking, great idea, but it doesn't work to take dents out. worked on my car all day and it didn't do nothing at all...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: I have tried everything to make this work. I tried it on small dents to larger ones, none popped out. Best bet is spend a little more and go to a dent pro.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: I used it once and the piece broke. Who do I contact before leaving a negative review?
customer_reviews.text: I used it once and the piece broke. Who do I contact before leaving a negative review?
customer_reviews.author: Emilio Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: I think I spent more time trying to get the glue off than I did setting it up. Did I mention that it didn't remove a single dent? Save your money.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Bumper
customer_reviews.text: Great to fix the "holes" and dents in the bumpers and sides of your car.
customer_reviews.author: Jakub Stepien

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it, it got all the dents out of his truck
customer_reviews.author: richerson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves these dent repair!! He bought so many and will continue :) works really good .
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Does The Trick
customer_reviews.text: Works well glad I bought it. Repaired three dents already.
customer_reviews.author: MIKEL  MINSHALL

customer_reviews.title: Patience equals great results
customer_reviews.text: Love this kit. Great price. A little bit of a learning curve. Not product fault. It is an art. Worked great.
customer_reviews.author: jimmy mcfarland

customer_reviews.title: easy to operate when directions are followed
customer_reviews.text: Ease of operation. Great for small to moderate size dents and door dings
customer_reviews.author: Wesley

customer_reviews.title: ineffective
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work. After several attempts at trying to get the dent out, the product did not work. Tried multiple times, with varying levels of glue dry time... the glue would not hold long enough to pull out the dent.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary McDowell

customer_reviews.title: It take a bit of elbow grease
customer_reviews.text: I actually want to see if I could get some dents out of my fridge. I got them out but over pulled now I have bubbles. Didn't work like I wanted it to but it does what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: lilbit

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheap product doesn't work as advertised
customer_reviews.author: Bruce m wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's a good tool. Saved me from paying someone to pull the dent. Took 5 times to get results I was happy with. Still have enough glue to do 25 more.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonable for a great product
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product has a great ability to remove dents with out drilling or welding
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I was wanting... The glue is a bit hard to remove..
customer_reviews.author: Tait

customer_reviews.title: I would buy another one
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job. But had to buy different glue sticks. Glue come with kit don't hold very good
customer_reviews.author: Danny Pitts

customer_reviews.title: Great product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: great product at a good price and fast shipping. A pleasure to do business with.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Thompson

customer_reviews.title: This kit is unable to repair dents
customer_reviews.text: Dent puller kit is unable to pull dents. Looks like I need to order bigger kit.
customer_reviews.author: sinai

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money unless you are taking dents out of aluminum cans
customer_reviews.author: H D Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Will it work? It did.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the dent I needed to get removed. I hope I would need it again, but I’ll have it if a do.
customer_reviews.author: R S M

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I used the product to pull door dings out. Works fabulous!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Taylor

customer_reviews.title: at least tell me it is not in the kit
customer_reviews.text: I can not even use it no release agent ..come on people..
customer_reviews.author: Dale

customer_reviews.title: Take repairs to a shop. This does not work
customer_reviews.text: Does not work glue pops before dent even begins to pull out
customer_reviews.author: holt

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my 2008 Tahoe. Worked great after a little practice
customer_reviews.author: jim fraley

customer_reviews.title: best cash spent
customer_reviews.text: my husband says its the best cash he we have ever spent on a car repair kit
customer_reviews.author: jean levell

product_meta.title: Super PDR Paintless Dent Repair (PDR Tool) Kit - 42Pcs Car Dent Puller Removal Dent Remover Kit
feature_bullets: Professional Paintless Dent Removel Repair Tools Kits;Perfect for Car Body hail damge dent and door ding repair removal,Save your money and time to go the repair shop.
Easy To Control-DIY can removal the dent by yourself,Suitable for any person to operate,It has the advantages of simple operation,repair the dent for you directly
Can Be Widey Use-Our PDR Tool is suitable for the sheet metal processing of automobile,refrigerator,and washing machine,etc
Dent lifter have a soft silicone on the bottom which no harmful for oil paint;Baking-varnish-free dent repair,will no damage the paint,faster

Outstanding Design And Smooth Texture Feel-Our dent lifter is our PATENTED products,on the bottom of which is silicone, not ordinary rubber,which is very soft and not harmful for oil paint and can be teared down.the product is very strong and durable.
